items.name: live-waveform
items.title: Live Waveform
items.description: A customizable live audio waveform visualizer using the Web Audio API.

items.name: support-box
items.title: Support Box
items.description: A collapsible animated support widget for quick help actions using Framer Motion.

items.name: overlay-button
items.title: Overlay Button
items.description: An animated gradient button using Framer Motion with looping motion and spring transitions.

items.name: border-button
items.title: Border Button
items.description: A reactive border animation button that follows cursor movement using Framer Motion and CSS masks.

items.name: wavy-text-block
items.title: Wavy Text Block
items.description: A scroll-triggered wavy text animation component that creates flowing motion effects using Framer Motion and scroll context.

items.name: inverted-cursor
items.title: Inverted Cursor
items.description: A smooth, animated custom cursor component with blend mode effects.

items.name: pixel-button
items.title: Pixel Button
items.description: A pixelated button animation effect built with Tailwind CSS and React.

items.name: plasma
items.title: Plasma
items.description: A mesmerizing plasma shader animation rendered with WebGL, perfect for dynamic backgrounds and previews.

items.name: radial-intro
items.title: Radial Intro
items.description: A dynamic radial orbit animation built with Motion and React, featuring upright spinning image nodes.

items.name: logo-cloud
items.title: Logo Cloud
items.description: A responsive logo grid component supporting dark mode, decorations, and flexible layout.

items.name: wave-path
items.title: Wave Path
items.description: A dynamic interactive SVG wave component that responds to pointer movement.

items.name: magnetize-button
items.title: Magnetize Button
items.description: A magnetic particle-attraction button built with Framer Motion.

items.name: text-roll
items.title: Text Roll
items.description: A rolling hover-animated text component built with Motion One.

items.name: activity-dropdown
items.title: Activity Dropdown
items.description: A modern activity/notification dropdown with smooth animations and responsive motion.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: A flexible and customizable Badge component for labels, statuses, and indicators.

items.name: animated-list
items.title: Animated List
items.description: A dynamic list component with smooth animations that forms a column and scrolls through items continuously.

items.name: logo-timeline
items.title: Logo Timeline
items.description: A multi-row infinitely scrolling logo timeline built with Motion One, supporting hover-activated animations and row grouping.

items.name: logo-loop
items.title: Logo Timeline
items.description: A looping logo marquee component with horizontal and vertical motion, hover effects, fading edges, and responsive behavior.

items.name: pricing-interaction
items.title: Pricing Interaction
items.description: An interactive pricing switcher with animated numbers, selectable plans, and monthly/yearly billing modes.

items.name: rest-api
items.title: Rest API
items.description: A beautifully animated REST API visualization component with SVG paths, glowing lights, badges, and interactive motion effects.

items.name: macbook-keyboard
items.title: Macbook Keyboard
items.description: Interactive animated MacBook keyboard component.

items.name: cpu-architecture
items.title: CPU Architecture
items.description: A fully animated CPU architecture SVG component with dynamic paths, gradients, and optional CPU connections.

items.name: shadcn-ui
items.title: Shadcn UI
items.description: Animated ShadCN UI SVG with glowing masked paths, motion shapes, and dynamic shimmering text with customizable props.

items.name: location-map
items.title: Location Map
items.description: An interactive 3D-tilting location card with expandable animated map, live indicator, and motion-based hover effects.

items.name: 3d-folder
items.title: 3D Folder
items.description: A 3D animated folder component that reveals project cards on hover and expands into a smooth image lightbox with keyboard navigation.
